title: Same sex marriage and the Mosaic Moral Imaginary
description:
Before you get to trying to apply a prohibition in the book of Leviticus it's important to try to figure out where these covenantal laws fit into the scheme of the Bible. The Patriarchs lived in a sort of semi-civilized "wild-west" of a region where the moral imaginary was socially enforced because there wasn't an over-arching imperial authority. The Mosaic covenant creates a moral imaginary that changes the context.
